Input dataÂ¶

Any supported GEMINI ARC spectra is suitable for the wavecal program. The supported instrument and modes are:
  • GMOS
  • Long Slit
  • MOS
  • IFU
  • GNIRS
  • Long Slit
  • Cross Dispersed
  • NIRI Longslit
  • Flamingos-2
  • Long Slit
  • MOS
  • NIFS Long Slit
